OOC: The leader of the Toads was Complex. He NOTHING on Toad Borg, the purp=
le guy. He kicked ALL of the ass!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 16,=
 2001 8:45 PM
  Subject: Shockwave & Unitron


  (Not sure.  Was Toad Borg =
the purple robot who was second in command, or the 
  grey one who was lead=
ing the Toads?)

  Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot:




  Shockwave's=
 scanners detected all incoming attacks instantly before they had 
  even l=
eft a foot's distance from the attackers and he quickly formulated a 
  pla=
n in his mind.

  He spun around in a barrel roll, dodging both missiles di=
rectly, flames and 
  shrapnel digging into his left wing and causing huge =
scrapes.

  The Emepror fired off twenty-five rapid laser bolts, five at Cl=
eder, Rixer, 
  Forrior, Blyer and Firearm.

  "Firestarter," he said via c=
omm., "you and Sixshot are to report to my 
  location.  I require combat a=
ssistance."

  "Understood." he replied.

  Unitron dived down, several of =
the shots digging into his form.  "Afts..." he 
  cursed, transforming in m=
id air to his tank mode, slamming to the ground, the 
  barrel of his large=
 cannon already aimed at Train Wreck.  Three large laser 
  blasts launched=
 out at Train Wreck, the machine gun mounted on his turret 
  firing off te=
n rapid laser blasts at Hot Rod.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subje=
ct to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
